main event: A single bright object was observed maneuvering and hovering in the sky for about 15 minutes on May 10, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as brightly lighted in amber and white colors., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., The object was not visible after some time and then reappeared before vanishing again., There was no physical evidence or photographs documented., The conclusion of the report states that the identity of the object remains unknown.
sighted object: a single bright object in the sky
